about_me:
I deliver standalone, flexible and extendable software products by virtue of building good architecture of the app and using the most suitable way to solve different kind of problems.
	As Flutter developer I’m experienced with: Dart lang, RxDart, working with HTTP in Flutter, Firebase Framework, effectively scale UI according to different screen sizes, localization of the app with RTL support, GoogleMaps and working with location, caching data and sharing data via other apps.
	I’m experienced with CI/CD for smoothly testing and releasing applications bot for iOS and Android. For this purpose I use Codemagic and fastlane CI/CD tooling.
	As for architecture most commonly I use BLoC for Flutter apps might be with elements of Clean Architecture and Repository pattern.
